content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello, Emilia. It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment in München to be a great living space. How much are you willing to pay for the rental?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm interested in your apartment, Mister Schmidt, but I want to make sure I'm getting a fair price. Can you tell me what the lowest price would be for this unfurnished one-bedroom apartment in the city center?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but I'm not willing to negotiate the price. I'm looking for a tenant who is willing to pay the market rate for such a prime location. The apartment is newly built and in the heart of the city, which makes it quite valuable. If you're not willing to pay a fair price, I'll find someone else who is.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, Mister Schmidt. However, as a student, I'm on a budget, and I'm looking for the best deal possible. Is there any way we can work together to find a price that is fair for both of us?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: As a landlord, I have to consider the cost of maintenance, insurance, and other expenses. I'm offering a high-quality apartment in a great location, and I'm not willing to reduce the price. If you're not willing to pay what I'm asking, I'm sure there are other apartments on the market that might fit within your budget.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your time, Mister Schmidt, but I'm afraid I can't afford to pay the full market rate. I'm looking for a discount that reflects my status as a student and my commitment to being a dependable and responsible tenant. If you're not willing to negotiate, I'll have to look elsewhere.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I understand your situation, Emilia, but as a landlord, I have to be firm with the prices. I'm looking for a tenant who values the quality and location of the apartment and is willing to pay accordingly. If you're not willing to pay the market rate, then I'm sorry, but we won't be able to reach an agreement. Good luck with your search for a more affordable option.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your time, Mister Schmidt. I'll continue my search for an apartment that fits within my budget. I hope you find a tenant who appreciates the value of your property. TERMINATE
name: Emilia Müller from Germany
